mapper.insert: insert ignore into contact(user_id, contact_id) values(#{userId}, #{contactId})
mapper.delete: delete from contact where user_id=#{userId} and contact_id=#{contactId}
mapper.select: select contact_id, name, avatar, `group`, remark, sign from (select contact_id, `group`, remark from contact where user_id=#{userId}) as c join user on c.contact_id = user.id
